Key Description: The affected family member who seeks medical attention for a genetic disorder thereby bringing the family under study.
The participant is a true control for the phenotype under consideration.
A female who contributes to the genetic makeup of her offspring from the fertilization of her ovum.
A male who contributes to the genetic makeup of his offspring through the fertilization of an ovum by his sperm.
A person's brother or sister with whom they share a genetic makeup inherited from one or both of their shared biological parents.
